name: Balls of Duty
description:
World War Party: Balls of Duty

In this series, all the nations fight each other in hilarious challenges. We start with Balls of Duty, a soccer inspired multiplayer action title for up to 8 players.

Currently, the basic functions are being realized and the first characters are starting to get animated. We need your feedback to get things right/better!

Features
  • hand drawn 2d animations
  • funny characters and cartoon violence
  • mouse/keyboard and game pad support
  • plattforms: PC, Mac (Coming soon: Android TV, iOS/Android)
  • crossplay: Play how you want! Use your mobile device to join a PC multiplayer match for example
Controls

The game supports mouse and keyboard as well gamepads.

Movement: WASD or analog stick
Boost/attack: Left click or A button
Exit tank: Right click or B button
Menu: Esc or start button

Hold boost button to run. You can hit the ball stronger or foul the players while boosting.
